parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Select a sound declared in the [[Description.ext#Sound|Description.ext]] of the mission to be played the first time the [[Briefing.html#Notes|Notes tab]] is selected in the [[Briefing.html|briefing]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onBriefingNotes''' soundName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onBriefingNotes]] "NotesVoiceOver";</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Description.ext#Sounds|CfgSounds]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 8 Feb, 2007</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Bdfy|Bdfy]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In OFP it works only with the sound files defined in the mission's description.ext
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
